item.description:
This new hip cooperative contemporary art gallery in Boston 's SoWa Arts District has two new exhibits with openings on Friday night Sept. 10th.

"Respite- patterns & places - real & imaged" - works by Christine O'Brien

"The Galapagos Suite" - works by Claudine Bing

Let's meet there, view some art and socialize with the guests and artists. Last months opening drew lots of people. Expect there to be crowds again. If its too crowded, we can visit another gallery.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the enrtry with an orange shirt
item.name: Galatea Fine Art Gallery Opening
